text_block_list.text: When I was out with Matikanetannhauser...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, it's Bourbon-san and Rice-san. Hello~!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Hello, Tannhauser-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: H-hello... What a coincidence. Are you two out as well?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes, taking a break is important too~. Are you two out as well?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Bourbon-san said to go to Bubbly Land. She brought invitation tickets for me.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Mission 1 'Winning a Prize' successful. Mission 2 'Inviting Rice-san to Bubbly Land' in progress.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Th-thank you... for being so kind to Rice.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Confirming 'gratitude' from Rice-san. Searching for response... You're welcome.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yes...! Well then, see you later, Tannhauser-san!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hehe, you two get along so well. That's nice, it looks fun~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: That's right! Let's go too, Bubbly Land! Because we're good friends too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yay! Alright then, off to Bubbly Land, go go!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow, it's so lively here~. But, but I just had to...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Forget my swimsuit~! Ugh... my bubbly~~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Not just the swimsuit, but even a fluffy fan too~ thank you so much♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wahoo♪ Bubbly is the best~♪

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The parade time is coming up soon... I really want to see it, see it... but... I danced too much and got sleepy~ --

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mumble mumble... zzz~~.
choice_data_list: I'll record the parade on video

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huff... huff... we finally made it! It's high up~, the water slide!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: The more difficult it was, the more I enjoyed it... Huh, my nose is tingling...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, I might get a nosebleed!?
The lively time with Matikanetannhauser passed in the blink of an eye...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wow~, Bubble Land is so fun. I'm glad I came~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Those two over there...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Search... search... Confirming Rice-san's approach.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: S-sorry to keep you waiting...! Um, well—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: If it's not a bother... here.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Body temperature and heart rate both rising due to an accidental event. ...Actually, I also bought a drink for Rice-san.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh, Bourbon-san too? For someone like Rice... th-thank you.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I'm glad you're pleased. ...Mission complete.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah... Rice too. ...Hehe, we're the same.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Both of them, thinking of each other... Nice respect~, yeah yeah.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I should learn from them and not forget to be considerate—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Hmm? But me, I'm always relying on the trainer, aren't I...!?
choice_data_list: I want you to repay me with race results!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll worry about it~! This kind of thing is give and take!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, I'll go buy something delicious too!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? It's so crowded... I-I'm getting swept away!?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Wahh~! Where am I going!?
We rescued Matikanetannhauser, and both ended up exhausted.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yes, leave it to me! I'll win like crazy~!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Umm, so then I need to improve the quality of training... how do I do that?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ooh! Then what kind of race should we run? We have to think about the schedule too... ugh~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Wait, with this, I'll just be relying on you again~~!
Matikanetannhauser was racking her brain over how she could repay the favor...
